title: Ubisoft announces Rainbow Six Mobile for iOS and Android, hereâ€™s how you can register for early access
content:
Ubisoft has announced that it’s bringing its popular tactical FPS, Rainbow Six Siege, to mobile. The company says that the mobile version of the game, aptly named Rainbow Six Mobile, will bring the core gameplay of the PC and console versions to both iOS and Android devices. According to Ubisoft’s announcement, Rainbow Six Mobile will

The post Ubisoft announces Rainbow Six Mobile for iOS and Android, here’s how you can register for early access appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Ubisoft is bringing its popular FPS title Rainbow Six Siege to mobile. Here's how you can register for Rainbow Six Mobile to get early access on Android and iOS.
